name: Unforgiving Happiness
description: Connect the batteries and collect the energy while discovering the inspiring story of a hard-working, independent developer and his journey to happiness.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Celeron CPU 1.50GHz or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
